content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from the user to generate an image of an octopus with the prompt "Octopus". The image was saved to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/7fa46c26-0f90-40cf-bf0f-e54c17b5340a.jpg and the user commanded me to write the image to a file named octopus_image.jpg. The command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully. The user also wrote the website URL to a file named octopus_urls.txt. When the user commanded me to read the file octopus_urls.txt, I returned the URL https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html. The user then commanded me to open the image file with the command {"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open octopus_image.jpg"}}}.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\\n\\n  Your Terminal type is unknown!\\n\\n  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] \\nTERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y\\n\\n\\n  Your Terminal type is unknown!\\n\\n  Enter a terminal type: [vt100] \\nTERMINAL TYPE IS SET TO y\\n\'\nSTDERR:\nb\'Error: no "view" rule for type "image/jpeg" passed its test case\\n       (for more information, add "--debug=1" on the command line)\\nTerminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links2: not found\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: elinks: not found\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: links: not found\\nTerminal initialisation failed - unknown terminal type?\\n/usr/bin/xdg-open: 882: w3m: not found\\nxdg-open: no method available for opening \\\'octopus_image.jpg\\\'\\n\''}]
"""
